summary: Nine Inch Nails (NIN) is an American rock band formed in 1988 by Trent Reznor and Atticus Ross. They started with their debut album *Pretty Hate Machine* and gained popularity with *The Downward Spiral* and *The Fragile*. After some breaks, they released more albums like *With Teeth* and *Year Zero*. The band is known for their intense live shows with special effects and unique lighting. NIN has won two Grammy Awards and been inducted into the Rock and Roll Hall of Fame. They have sold over 20 million records worldwide.
title: Nine Inch Nails
